Name: Epic Vampire
About the game: You must Bite ALL of the people to make them into Vampires. Collect ALL Bitecoins. Use Speed Boost to traverse quickly across the Map. Transform into Goth Vamp. Use a Powerball to stun victims. Drive a Hearse in a race against time. Fly as a Bat over the City to new heights. If You are out in the Sunlight too long, You will catch on fire. Biting People restores some of Your Health. * This game has Permadeath, so, If You Die or Quit, You have to start over from the beginning. *
Meta Title: Epic Vampire: Apr 6, 2022, Archor Wright and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Epic Vampire? Check out the release date (Apr 6, 2022), developer insights from Archor Wright, and a complete game summary.
